bibl.title: Dispatch from L. de R. du Verge to J. C. Bancroft Davis
Despatches from United States consuls in St. Paul de Loanda, 1854-1893

correspAction.persName: Davis, J. C. Bancroft (John Chandler Bancroft), 1822-1907

revisionDesc.change: Creation of individual xml files, review, and addition encoding

div1.p: United States Consulate at St Paul de Loanda

L. de R. du Verge
to Dept of State

opener.dateline:
United States Consulate
St Paul de Loanda
August 14th 1882

address.addrLine: To Honoble. J. C. Bancroft Davis

div1.p: I have the honor to state that I have just received a letter dated Bailundu S.W. Africa signed Francis O. Nichols secty. of the Am: Mission in which he states that he and all his friends there are well and enjoying good health, also that the country is very beautiful, fertile and healthy, and the natives very kind, beside abundant game.
The Portuguese authorities agree with Mr. Nichols statement, and told me about that country few weeks ago.

closer.salute:
I have the honor to be Sir
Respectfully
Your obedient servant
closer.signed:
L de R du Verge
US Consul.
